experience.title: Software Engineer Intern | Foqal
experience.details: Overhauled Agent UI with React, TypeScript, and Bootstrap, leveraging Figma designs to elevate its visual design and relocate functionality from previous versions. Located and debugged known issues with the channel template component regarding its text box area, adding a side scroll feature to negate text overflow and reduce unforeseen behaviors. Engaged in Agile Development, collaborated with other engineers, engaged in stand-ups and planning poker to successfully allocate tickets between team members.

experience.title: Back-End Supervisor | Half-n-Half Tea Express
experience.details: Trained team members in successful strategies to meet procedural standards and achieve daily sales targets. Effectively allocated tasks during high-traffic hours to keep operations running smoothly and prevent a bottleneck on incoming orders.
